detail_desc: Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
3/4-length trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frills at the hems.
Aqua shoes in patterned scuba fabric with a loop at the back and textured soles.

Shoulder bag in imitation leather and canvas containing some linen. Flap with a magnetic fastener, a metal chain shoulder strap, two compartments under the flap and a zipped compartment at the back. Size approx. 6.5x7.5x14 cm.
Two pairs of treggings in stretch corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Tops and boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey. Tops with a racer back and elasticated hem. Briefs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, hood, front pockets and a contrasting colour zip down the front with a chin guard.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with buttons at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves.
Fitted top in stretch mesh with a round neck and long sleeves.
Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave in a slightly wider style with flap chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Trousers in a soft cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and fake pockets. Jersey lining.
V-neck top in an airy weave with pleats on the shoulders, short, raglan flutter sleeves, and a rounded hem. Loose fit.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and patterned soles.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and a lace trim at the cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Sleeveless body in jersey with cut-out rips at the front and all down the back, press-studs at the crotch and raw edges.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Top in softly draping jersey with a sheen. V-neck with a wide lace trim, and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print motif on the front.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Matt opaque tights with a control top to hold in the tummy and seat. 100 denier.
Jacket in washed denim with worn details, side pockets, flap chest pockets with a button and buttons at the cuffs.
A-line coat in faux fur with a rounded collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck with decorative ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Partly lined.
Shirt in airy pima cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Fancy dress costume in glittery jersey with a shimmering metallic print. Narrow shoulder straps with organza flounces, a glittery appliqué at the top, a flounced, V-shaped seam at the waist and a flared skirt in shimmering organza. Detachable, padded tail in patterned satin with a hook and loop fastening. The skirt is lined with taffeta.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-neck and gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups with raw-edge, cut-off hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knitted cashmere scarf with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x170 cm.
Short dress in soft, ribbed jersey with lace trims, a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front with decorative ties at one side. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
KELZUKI x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Loafers in velour with cotton canvas linings, quilted satin insoles and fluted soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
TOCA LIFE x H&M. Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Rib-knit jumper in wool containing some cashmere. V-neck, extra-long, wide raglan sleeves, high slits in the sides and elasticated ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Metal hoop earrings with a pendant. Diameter approx. 5 cm.
Cropped top in an airy rib knit with flounced shoulder straps and a flounce at the top.
Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets.

Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with embroidery at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in one side. Gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Lined.

Sports jacket in sturdy jersey with a reflective print at the back of the neck. Mesh-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, and narrow, elasticated trims in a contrasting colour at the cuffs and back of the hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Trainers in imitation leather with embroidery, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with high-cut legs.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Front and back pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.
5-pocket, slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with embroidered appliqués, a high waist and button fly.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, pleats at the top to create soft draping and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in plumeti chiffon with a V-neck, a double-layer front and frills at the front that continue over the shoulders to the back.
Fully lined, textured swimsuit with a wide flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and one narrow, adjustable shoulder strap.
Sandals with open toes, covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.

Long cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs, hem and back of the neck. No buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Push-up bra in microfibre and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.

Two pairs of all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline and a concealed zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. One patterned pair.
Glittery set with a pair of bat wings and a segmented, flippy skirt in tulle. Wings with elastic shoulder straps and skirt with an elasticated waist.
Oversized gilet in cotton twill with a zip down the front and flap chest and front pockets. Deep armholes and a yoke with a loop at the back.
Blouse in a jacquard weave with fringes, a V-neck, wrapover front and 3/4-length sleeves. Chiffon lining.
Blouse in silk crêpe with a collar and detachable ties at the top and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves, cuffs with two buttons, and a rounded hem.
Long jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck and low dropped shoulders.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back where they have a wide lace trim, and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fabric trainers with a concealed elastic gore at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a lined drawstring hood. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wedge-heel sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9 cm.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Concealed zip in one side and tapered legs with creases. Lined at the top.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication, and an overlocked hem.
Loose-fitting jersey top with a V-neck at the front and short sleeves.
Gently tailored jacket in a woven viscose blend with notch lapels, a button at the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit with press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. Top with long raglan sleeves and press-studs down one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist and full feet with elastication at the heels. Hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
